name: The Forward Path
flavor_text: Forged in honor of Weyloran, and roads yet traveled.

frame.name: Adaptive Frame
frame.description: A well-rounded grip, reliable and sturdy.

perks.description:
Ranged scope. Long zoom. 
  •  Increases range
  •  Decreases handling speed
perks.name: Rifle Scope ST

perks.description:
Focused scope. Long zoom. 
  •  Slightly increases range
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed
perks.name: Rifle Scope SSF

perks.description:
Snapshot sight. Short zoom.
  •  Increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases range
perks.name: Cleanshot IS

perks.description:
Agile sight. Short zoom. 
  •  Greatly increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases range
perks.name: Hitmark IS

perks.description:
Snapshot sight. Short zoom. 
  •  Slightly increases range
  •  Increases handling speed
perks.name: Red Dot 2 MOA

perks.description:
Agile sight. Short zoom. 
  •  Increases range
  •  Increases handling speed
perks.name: Red Dot Micro

perks.description:
This weapon can fire longer distances.
  •  Increases range
perks.name: Accurized Rounds

perks.description:
This weapon's magazine is built for higher capacity.
  •  Increases magazine size
perks.name: Appended Mag

perks.description:
This weapon has multiple tactical improvements.
  •  Slightly increases stability
  •  Increases reload speed
  •  Slightly increases magazine size
perks.name: Tactical Mag

perks.description:
This weapon has a greatly increased magazine size, but reloads much slower.
  •  Greatly increases magazine size
  •  Greatly decreases reload speed
perks.name: Extended Mag

perks.description:
This magazine is optimized for recoil control.
  •  Greatly increases stability 
  •  Slightly decreases range
perks.name: Steady Rounds

perks.description: Faster reloads when the magazine is empty.
perks.name: Alloy Magazine

perks.description:
Optimized for fast reloading.
  •  Slightly increases stability
  •  Greatly increases reload speed
perks.name: Flared Magwell

perks.description: Melee final blows reload this weapon's magazine from reserves.
perks.name: Grave Robber

perks.description: Increases accuracy, stability, and precision hit targeting when firing from the hip.
perks.name: Hip-Fire Grip

perks.description: Each rapid kill with this weapon progressively increases reload speed for a short time.
perks.name: Feeding Frenzy

perks.description: Automatically reloads the magazine and improves weapon handling when wounded—even when this weapon is stowed.
perks.name: Pulse Monitor

perks.description: Improves accuracy and stability while continuously holding down the trigger.
perks.name: Dynamic Sway Reduction

perks.description: Rapidly landing precision hits will return two rounds to the magazine.
perks.name: Fourth Time's the Charm

perks.description: Massively improves weapon stability at the cost of reload speed.
perks.name: Iron Grip

perks.description: Massively improves weapon target acquisition at the cost of weapon range.
perks.name: Iron Gaze

perks.description: This weapon gains increased damage from melee kills and kills with this weapon.
perks.name: Swashbuckler

perks.description: Reloading grants increased damage based on the number of rapid kills made beforehand.
perks.name: Multikill Clip

perks.description: This weapon becomes more accurate and boosts handling as your health gets lower.
perks.name: Eye of the Storm

perks.description: Grants a short period of increased stability and accuracy on initial trigger pull.
perks.name: Tap the Trigger
